titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to The Stanford Years, Being an Excerpt from "Memoranda," the Unpublished Autobiography of Theodore J. Hoover
The Stanford Years, Being an Excerpt from "Memoranda," the Unpublished Autobiography of Theodore J. Hoover
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: The Stanford years, being an excerpt from "memoranda," the unpublished autobiography of Theodore J. Hoover:
did.abstract: Manuscript (typescript) excerpt from "Memoranda," the unpublished autobiography of Theodore J. Hoover. As most of the papers of Dean Hoover were lost in a fire, this manuscript provides valuable insight into the world of an early Stanford student, professor, and administrator (1897-1936).

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: The Stanford years, being an excerpt from "memoranda," the unpublished autobiography of Theodore J. Hoover (SCM0231). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Head, Department of Mining and Metallurgy (1919- ) and founding dean of the School of Engineering (1925-1936). Stanford class of 1901.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Manuscript (typescript) excerpt from "Memoranda," the unpublished autobiography of Theodore J. Hoover. As most of the papers of Dean Hoover were lost in a fire, this manuscript provides valuable insight into the world of an early Stanford student, professor, and administrator (1897-1936).
